name: Bandit On'a Bridge (VTKolby Games)
description:
Welcome to Bandit On'a Bridge!

...or as the team and I like to call it, Bob! This is a  2D, surreal comedy experience that focuses on diverting expectations and using odd item combinations to reach your goal. The world consists of doodles and paper cut-outs, and your goal is to reach the other side of the bridge while avoiding a bandit named Bob.

Basic Controls:

Movement: WASD

Pick up Items and Mailbox Interaction: E

Use Items: Left Click

Other controls will be explained throughout the game. It is up to you to decide which items are used at which points in the levels.

Meet the Team!
  • Robert Flores: Producer, UI
  • Tony Marino: Lead Programmer
  • Samuel He: Programmer
  • Austin S: Programmer
  • Valerie Kolb: Sound Designer
  • Zach Proffitt: Artist
Looking for More?

Bandit On'a Bridge is the finished product of our senior capstone project. If you liked checking our game out, follow this link to see the rest of the games submitted by teams in our capstone class! https://depaulgames.cdm.depaul.edu/

Disclaimer: The bandit's name is Bob, the player's name is Player.
